name: vroom
description:
This is a Seated VR (with non-VR support) racer Prototype extremely in progress, looking to try and make a mini Burnout Paradise world and navigation feel.

Support

Supports Keyboard, Gamepad, and Racing Wheels (i think), list of supported controllers here, tested with the Xbox One Controller

VR Support: Oculus Rift, maybe OpenVR but it hasn't been tested (if you have an OpenVR headset, please leave a note of feedback, thanks!)

Controls (Gamepad Preferred) Known Issues
  • The ship physics are EXTREMELY in progress
  • Ship physics will sometimes push you into a wall and lock you there
  • Some map areas and shortcuts are hard to reach, due to above physics development
  • Custom game mode not implemented
